node.address: Calle 12 c N 2-10, Centro histórico, Barrio de la Candelaria , Bogota, Colombia

content.value:
Fatima is an intercultural hostel with two locations, in the first house we have most of the private rooms and some dorms for our guests who want a place to chill; we have yoga classes and free art classes. In the second house, we have the most of the dorms where our guests can find a place to meet more people and have fun. We have a very well-known bar/restaurant where the guests can find many activities such as karaoke, playroom and dancing classes and share with other travelers and local people to feel like real Colombians.

Fatima is a multicultural meeting place. It is a house that is more than 150 years old. With a beautiful colonial architecture it is a place where you You can feel how the families of the nineteenth century used to live. Everything is adapted to a contemporary environment; wooden floors, stained glass windows, a central water fountain, solarium with satellite television and DVD player, a complete room with WI-FI service, sauna, Jacuzzi computer. It is also included in the property of a room with international music, where all our clients get related around a warm fireplace.
Fatima Hostel combines great decoration in an environment that makes the house pleasant and unforgettable. Fatima Hostel is located in the neighborhood of La Candelaria, in the historic center, the house is one block from the Chorro de Quevedo, where the city was founded. Within walking distance are the oldest streets and houses in the city and some of the most representative symbols of the city such as the Plaza de Bolívar, the Gold Museum, the Vase House, Army Museum, the Luis Angel Arango library , Camerin del Carmen, Santa Clara Church, the Casa de Nariño and the collection donated by Fernando Botero at the Casa de la Moneda. The Candelaria District is also a place of Universities that has a wide variety of restaurants, theaters, cafes and bars for all tastes.

description.description: Fatima Hostel Bogota is located in two beautiful colonial houses in the historical center of Bogota where the most important touristic attractions are. Travelers can find the most emblematic museums like Botero and Gold museum and many cultural and historical places like Monserrate, Plaza de Bolívar and others very close by.
